text.__SUMMARY__: The Mexican vole (Microtus mexicanus) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae found in Mexico and the United States.
text.References: Musser, G. G. and M. D. Carleton. 2005. Superfamily Muroidea. pp. 894–1531 in Mammal Species of the World a Taxonomic and Geographic Reference. D. E. Wilson and D. M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore.
